channel.title: Interacting with Entities on Different Heights
channel.description: Can a player or npc interact with another player or npc on different height levels? What I mean by this is if you have player A at level 0, and npc B at level 1, could player A attack npc B or do they have to be at the same level? (An example of this would be castlewars, but I can't quite remember the result.)

item.title: Interacting with Entities on Different Heights
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Scratch what I said, just write some thing saying like
If (npcID == ####, heightLevel == #, npc != null) {
Starting it out like that, then build on it to add the player so like & playerHeight == or so and so

Read full topic

item.title: Interacting with Entities on Different Heights
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Well, obviously anything is possible, but u would have to essentially make he server think that height 0 and height 1 are the same, or are combined. So yes u could, but it would screw up everything else.

Read full topic
item.source: Interacting with Entities on Different Heights
